overview:
Gary has nearly 20 years of experience at leading companies in the consumer internet and professional services industries.

Gary is currently Vice President of Marketing for coupons.com, overseeing all consumer marketing functions, including online and broadcast advertising, sponsorships, social media, affiliate, SEO, SEM, email and publisher partnerships.

Prior to joining Coupons, Gary was President of Agilone, a SaaS-based marketing intelligence software company that helps clients maximize the lifetime value of their customers. Prior to Agilone, Gary ran business development for SendMe Mobile, a leading mobile media company that grew to over $150 million in revenue in under 3 years. Previous to his role at SendMe, Gary was responsible for eBay’s Consumer Electronics business, including all of its business development, marketing, user acquisition and PR initiatives. During his tenure, Gary grew the business by ten times its original size, achieving over $800 million in annual revenue. Prior to eBay, Gary worked in the Financial Assurance Practice of Ernst & Young LLP.

Gary has a B.S. degree from Villanova University and an M.B.A. from Wharton at the University of Pennsylvania.
